src.web package¶

Submodules¶

src.web.routes module¶

Chess Game Analysis Web Application.

This module provides the main Flask route for analyzing chess game data. It handles user submissions, processes game data through various services, and renders visualizations of the analysis results.

src.web.routes.index()¶

Handle root route with minimal logic.

Module contents¶

Chess Data Coach
